TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 用于在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Used to provide design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何扩展类。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二个演示如何扩展类并将其与在第一个代码示例中创建的类关联。The second demonstrates how to extend the class and associate it with the class that is created in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义设计器扩展的类的类，并重写方法。The following code example shows how to create a custom designer class that extends the class and overrides the method. 如果以前未设置属性 (即，它具有字段值)，调用方法将其设置为蓝色虚线边框宽度为三个像素，然后设计图面上将显示该边框。If the property has not been set previously (that is, it has the field value), a call to the method sets it to a blue-dashed border with a width of three pixels, and then displays that border on the design surface. 如果设置属性，将显示现有的边框属性值。If the property has been set, the existing border property values are displayed. 通常情况下，调用其基方法， ，其中调入关联的控件来生成标记的方法。Typically, the calls its base method, , which calls into the method of the associated control to generate the markup. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples/VB/custombutton.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用简单的类扩展类和关联`SampleButtonDesigner`类，通过在前面的示例中，创建对象。The following code example shows how to use a simple class that extends the class and is associated with the `SampleButtonDesigner` class, created in the preceding example, through the object. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples/VB/custombutton.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法替换具有属性属性控制如果不包含任何可显示的字符。The method replaces the property with the property of the control if the contains no displayable characters. 然后，方法调用其基方法， ，其中调入方法来生成标记。Then, the method calls its base method, , which calls into the method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法可以更改生成的标记。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the generated markup. 如果以前未设置属性 (即，它具有字段值)，调用方法将其设置为蓝色虚线边框宽度为三个像素，然后设计图面上将显示该边框。If the property has not been set previously (that is, it has the field value), a call to the method sets it to a blue-dashed border with a width of three pixels, and then displays that border on the design surface. 如果设置属性，将显示现有的边框属性值。If the property has been set, the existing border property values are displayed. 通常情况下，调用其基方法， ，其中调入关联的控件来生成标记的方法。Typically, the calls its base method, , which calls into the method of the associated control to generate the markup. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_ButtonDesignerSamples/VB/custombutton.vb#1)]

para.span: 如果您要重写方法，通常将修改所选的属性值，然后调用基方法，以生成标记，然后将属性还原到其原始值。

span.span: If you are overriding the method, typically you will modify selected property values, then call the base method to generate the markup, and then restore the properties to their original values.
